Help:Node.title: teach
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: teach ; teach [student] about [skill]
EXAMPLE: teach ; teach Azrael about fishing
Allows you to teach a skill. You must know how to teach. Your student must be worse than than you at the designated skill and must be willing to learn from you. You may teach only a certain number of students at a time, depending on how skilled you are at teaching; any individual student will have to spend some time with you to have an opportunity to learn the skill.
SEE ALSO: ,
